Download '''cups-bjnp''' here: http://sourceforge.net/projects/cups-bjnp/files/

Open a terminal, and type:

<pre>
tar zxf cups-bjnp-1.1.tar.gz
cd cups-bjnp-1.1/
./configure --prefix=/usr
make
sudo make install
</pre>

For ubuntu 12.10 64bit: At the <code>./configure</code> step, if you get an error "configure: error: CUPS library not found"  step then run: 
<pre>
sudo apt-get install libcups2 libcups2-dev
</pre>
and then continue with the <code>./configure</code> step.

Now go the '''System''' / '''Administration''' / '''Print''' menu, go to '''Network''', and select your printer.
Follow the instructions, select '''Canon PIXMA iP5300''' as the driver, and you are done.
